verses.verse: <S%G2036><s%> And He Said <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Impossible <S%G418><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> That <S%G3361><s%> Should Not Come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Offences, <S%G4625><s%> <S%G3759><s%> But Woe To Him <S%G1161><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> They Come. <S%G2064><s%>

It Is Profitable <S%G3081><s%> For Him <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> A Millstone <S%G3458><s%> Turned By An Ass <S%G3684><s%> Is Put <S%G4029><s%> About <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5137><s%> His Neck, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Is Cast <S%G4496><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea, <S%G2281><s%> Than <S%G2228><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Should Cause To Offend <S%G4624><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3398><s%> Of These Little Ones. <S%G5130><s%>

Take Heed <S%G4337><s%> To Yourselves : <S%G1438><s%> <S%G1437><s%> And If <S%G1161><s%> Should Sin <S%G264><s%> Against <S%G1519><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> Thy Brother, <S%G4675><s%> Rebuke <S%G2008><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> He Should Repent, <S%G3340><s%> Forgive <S%G863><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Seven Times <S%G2034><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> He Should Sin <S%G264><s%> Against <S%G1519><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Seven Times <S%G2034><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Should Return <S%G1994><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> I Repent, <S%G3340><s%> Thou Shalt Forgive <S%G863><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Give More <S%G4369><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> Faith. <S%G4102><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> But Said <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Ye Had <S%G2192><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Grain <S%G2848><s%> Of Mustard, <S%G4615><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Ye Might Say <S%G302><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4807><s%> To This Sycamine Tree, <S%G3778><s%> Be Thou Rooted Up, <S%G1610><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Be Thou Planted <S%G5452><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea, <S%G2281><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5219><s%> It Would Obey <S%G302><s%> You. <S%G5213><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> But Which <S%G1161><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> A Bondman <S%G1401><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Ploughing <S%G722><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Shepherding, <S%G4165><s%> Who To Him <S%G3739><s%> Come In <S%G1525><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Field <S%G68><s%> Will Say <S%G2046><s%> Immediately, <S%G2112><s%> Having Come <S%G3928><s%> Recline At Table? <S%G377><s%>

' <S%G235><s%> But <S%G3780><s%> Will He Not Say <S%G2046><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Prepare <S%G2090><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> I May Sup On, <S%G1172><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Girding Thyself About <S%G4024><s%> Serve <S%G1247><s%> Me, <S%G3427><s%> While <S%G2193><s%> I Eat <S%G5315><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Drink; <S%G4095><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Shalt Eat <S%G5315><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Drink <S%G4095><s%> Thou? <S%G4771><s%>

<S%G3361><s%> <S%G5485><s%> Is He Thankful <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> , To That Bondman <S%G1565><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> He Did <S%G4160><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Commanded <S%G1299><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Judge Not. <S%G1380><s%>

Thus <S%G3779><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye, <S%G5210><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Ye May Have Done <S%G4160><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Commanded <S%G1299><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Say, <S%G3754><s%> Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> Unprofitable <S%G888><s%> Are We, <S%G2070><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> That Which <S%G3739><s%> We Were Bound <S%G3784><s%> To Do <S%G4160><s%> We Have Done. <S%G4160><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4198><s%> His Going Up <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> That <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Passed <S%G1330><s%> Through The <S%G1223><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> Of Samaria <S%G4540><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1525><s%> On His Entering <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> A Certain <S%G5100><s%> Village <S%G2968><s%> Met <S%G528><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Ten <S%G1176><s%> Leprous <S%G3015><s%> Men, <S%G435><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Stood <S%G2476><s%> Afar Off. <S%G4207><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G846><s%> Lifted Up Their <S%G142><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Master, <S%G1988><s%> Have Compassion On <S%G1653><s%> Us. <S%G2248><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Seeing Them <S%G1492><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Having Gone <S%G4198><s%> Shew <S%G1925><s%> Yourselves <S%G1438><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Priests. <S%G2409><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Going <S%G5217><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> They Were Cleansed. <S%G2511><s%>

<S%G1520><s%> And One <S%G1161><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Was Healed, <S%G2390><s%> Turned Back, <S%G5290><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Loud <S%G3173><s%> Glorifying <S%G1392><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> On His <S%G1909><s%> Face <S%G4383><s%> At <S%G3844><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> His Feet, <S%G846><s%> Giving Thanks <S%G2168><s%> To Him : <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> A Samaritan. <S%G4541><s%>

Answering <S%G611><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Not <S%G3780><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ten <S%G1176><s%> Were Cleansed? <S%G2511><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Nine <S%G1767><s%> Where Are? <S%G4226><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> Were There Not Found Any <S%G2147><s%> Returning <S%G5290><s%> To Give <S%G1325><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> To God <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G241><s%> This Stranger? <S%G3778><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Having Risen Up <S%G450><s%> Go Forth; <S%G4198><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> Thy Faith <S%G4675><s%> Has Cured <S%G4982><s%> Thee. <S%G4571><s%>

<S%G1905><s%> And Having Been Asked <S%G1161><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> When <S%G4219><s%> Is Coming <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> He Answered <S%G611><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Comes Not <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Observation; <S%G3907><s%>

Nor <S%G3761><s%> Shall They Say, <S%G2046><s%> , Lo <S%G2400><s%> Here, <S%G5602><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> , Lo <S%G2400><s%> There; <S%G1563><s%> , <S%G2400><s%> For Lo, <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> In The Midst <S%G1787><s%> Of You <S%G5216><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And He Said <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Will Come <S%G2064><s%> Days, <S%G2250><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Ye Will Desire <S%G1937><s%> Of The <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> To See, <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Shall Not See It. <S%G3700><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Will Say <S%G2046><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> , Lo <S%G2400><s%> Here, <S%G5602><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Lo <S%G2400><s%> <S%G1563><s%> There; <S%G3361><s%> Go Not Forth <S%G565><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> Follow. <S%G1377><s%>

<S%G5618><s%> For As <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lightning <S%G796><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Lightens <S%G797><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The One End <S%G3588><s%> ' Under <S%G5259><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The Other End <S%G3588><s%> ' Under <S%G5259><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Shines, <S%G2989><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Will Be <S%G2071><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%> His Day. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G4412><s%> But First <S%G1161><s%> It Behooves <S%G1163><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Many Things <S%G4183><s%> To Suffer, <S%G3958><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Be Rejected <S%G593><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Generation <S%G1074><s%> This. <S%G3778><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Noah, <S%G3575><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Shall It Be <S%G2071><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man. <S%G444><s%>

They Were Eating, <S%G2068><s%> They Were Drinking, <S%G4095><s%> They Were Marrying, <S%G1060><s%> They Were Being Given In Marriage, <S%G1547><s%> <S%G891><s%> Until <S%G3739><s%> The Day <S%G2250><s%> Entered <S%G1525><s%> Noah <S%G3575><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ark, <S%G2787><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Flood <S%G2627><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Destroyed <S%G622><s%> All. <S%G537><s%>

In Like Manner <S%G3668><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Of Lot; <S%G3091><s%> They Were Eating, <S%G2068><s%> They Were Drinking, <S%G4095><s%> They Were Buying, <S%G59><s%> They Were Selling, <S%G4453><s%> They Were Planting, <S%G5452><s%> They Were Building; <S%G3618><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> But On The <S%G1161><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Went Out <S%G1831><s%> Lot <S%G3091><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Sodom <S%G4670><s%> It Rained <S%G1026><s%> Fire <S%G4442><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sulphur <S%G2303><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Destroyed <S%G622><s%> All. <S%G537><s%>

<S%G2596><s%> In This Way <S%G5024><s%> <S%G5023><s%> <S%G2071><s%> Shall It Be <S%G3739><s%> In The Day <S%G2250><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Is Revealed. <S%G601><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Day He <S%G2250><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Housetop, <S%G1430><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4632><s%> His Goods <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3614><s%> House, <S%G3361><s%> Let Him Not Come Down <S%G2597><s%> To Take Away <S%G142><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Field <S%G68><s%> <S%G3668><s%> Likewise <S%G3361><s%> Let Him Not Return <S%G1994><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Behind. <S%G3694><s%>
Remember <S%G3421><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wife <S%G1135><s%> Of Lot. <S%G3091><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> Whoever <S%G1437><s%> May Seek <S%G2212><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> His Life <S%G846><s%> To Save, <S%G4982><s%> Shall Lose <S%G622><s%> It; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whoever <S%G1437><s%> May Lose <S%G622><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> Shall Preserve <S%G2225><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> In That <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> There Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Two Men <S%G1417><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> Bed <S%G2825><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1520><s%> , Shall Be Taken, <S%G3880><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> Shall Be Left. <S%G863><s%>

Two Women <S%G1417><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G229><s%> Grinding <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Together; <S%G846><s%> <S%G1520><s%> , Shall Be Taken, <S%G3880><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> Shall Be Left. <S%G863><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> They Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Where, <S%G4226><s%> Lord? <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body Is <S%G4983><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Will Be Gathered Together <S%G4863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Eagles. <S%G105><s%>
